existing_features.title: Add a Home button (house icon) to the mobile bottom navigation that routes to the homepage ('/'), and ensure it uses the same active highlighting behavior as other bottom-nav items.

Implement the requested interaction for goals: users must be able to either swipe/slide a goal card or use a checkbox control to mark a goal as completed/not completed directly from the goals list, without needing to open the goal detail page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a Home button to return to the homepage
Implement the requested interaction: ability to drag/slide or check/select items ("faire glisser ou cocher")

projectName: Add Home button to bottom navigation and enable swipe/checkbox interactions on goals
